analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#511-526):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#522-525)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#525)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#359-411):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#367-381)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#381-384)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#400-403)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#399)
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#30-41) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#803-805) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#309-348):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#326-330)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#342-344)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#347-348)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#330-331)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#336-337)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#359-411):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#367-381)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#381-384)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#390-395)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#389)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#396-398)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#426-445):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#428-431)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#437-438)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#439-440)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#437)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#435-437)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#665-696) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#680-696)
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#681-696)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#214-216)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#198)
MintableToken.mintingFinished should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x57ccee9100daa272b962c48543460a8e3ac6f674.sol#893-894)
